direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods generate dates relative to the current time but in different directions (future vs. past).
Both methods generate dates relative to the current time but in different directions (future vs. past).
Both methods generate dates within a specified range, although 'birthday' uses years and 'between' uses Instant objects.
Both methods involve generating a random time-based value within a specified range, though 'birthday' uses years and 'duration' uses ChronoUnit.
Both methods involve generating a random time-based value within a specified range, though 'birthday' uses years and 'period' uses Period objects.
